name: sap-document-information-extraction
description: Document Information Extraction helps you to process various documents that have content in headers and tables. You can use the extracted information, for example, to automatically process payables, invoices, or payment notes while making sure that invoices and payables match.

servicePlans.name: Service plan ‘blocks_of_100’ for production usage of Document Information Extraction, charged in blocks of 100 documents.
servicePlans.displayName: Service plan ‘blocks_of_100’ for production usage of Document Information Extraction, charged in blocks of 100 documents.
servicePlans.description: Service plan ‘blocks_of_100’ for production usage of Document Information Extraction, charged in blocks of 100 documents.

servicePlans.name: Service plan 'default' for production usage of Document Information Extraction, charged in blocks of 1000 documents.
servicePlans.displayName: Service plan 'default' for production usage of Document Information Extraction, charged in blocks of 1000 documents.
servicePlans.description: Service plan 'default' for production usage of Document Information Extraction, charged in blocks of 1000 documents.
